article:

5 _ ,after about ten minutes,she said."Oh,that's why I can't find it in our   _   .You should have 7 _  a phone call a few days ago that your layaway was paid off by a(n)  _   Santa."I couldn't believe what I was hearing! This kind of story only happens in the   _   .Why was my family 10 _   to receive such a blessing?
Immediately I asked the cashier if there was a   _    that I could leave something for the Santa   in return for    his random act of kindness,but she said that the individual wanted to   _    completely unknown.It definitely   _    my heart.However.I felt kind of    _   .I kept thinking that perhaps some family out there was not going to have a Christmas because they really couldn't   _   to pick up their layaway.
I decided to pay it   _   ,so I used the money I had for the balance on my account to purchase some   _    and on my way out,I gladly   _    them off inside a huge toy donation box.Since I had received such a nice,heart warming gesture from someone,I wanted to keep the   _    going.And it felt nice to receive and to be able to give right back.
